ADD_LIBRARY(spdlog INTERFACE)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SPDLOG_SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spdlog/include/*)
TARGET_SOURCES(spdlog INTERFACE ${SPDLOG_SOURCES})
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(spdlog INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spdlog/include)

SET(SDL_WERROR OFF)
SET(SDL_SHARED OFF)
SET(SDL_STATIC ON)
SET(SDL_TEST OFF)
SET(CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP0077 NEW)
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY(sdl2 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)
ADD_LIBRARY(sdl2 INTERFACE)
FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SDL2_SOURCES ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SDL2/include/*)
TARGET_SOURCES(sdl2 INTERFACE ${SDL2_SOURCES})
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(sdl2 INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/SDL2/include)
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(sdl2 INTERFACE SDL2::SDL2main SDL2::SDL2-static)
